means: （使）反转( reverse的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_cn: 委员会改变了决定，请求埃文斯先生留下。

sentence.Network_en: The nation's highest court reversed the lower court's decision.
sentence.Network_cn: 该国最高法院已推翻了下级法院的判决。

sentence.Network_en: The car reversed into the loading bay.

entry.tran: 逆转，彻底改变（决定、政策、趋势等）
entry.def: When someone or something reverses a decision, policy, or trend, they change it to the opposite decision, policy, or trend.

example.ex: They have made it clear they will not reverse the decision to increase prices...
example.tran: 他们已经明确表示不会更改提价的决定。

example.ex: The rise, the first in 10 months, reversed the downward trend in Belgium's jobless rate.
example.tran: 10个月来失业率的首次上升逆转了比利时失业率持续下降的趋势。

entry.def: If you reverse the order of a set of things, you arrange them in the opposite order, so that the first thing comes last.

example.ex: In the squares place a penny, nickel, dime and quarter in that order. The object is to reverse the order of these coins...
example.tran: 在这些方块中按顺序放置1分、5分、10分和25分的硬币各一枚。目标是颠倒这些硬币的顺序。

example.ex: The normal word order is reversed in passive sentences.
example.tran: 正常词序在被动句中是颠倒的。

entry.def: If you reverse the positions or functions of two things, you change them so that each thing has the position or function that the other one had.

example.ex: He reversed the position of the two stamps.
example.tran: 他将两枚邮票的位置调换了一下。

entry.def: When a car reverses or when you reverse it, the car is driven backwards.

example.ex: Another car reversed out of the drive...

entry.def: If your car is in reverse, you have changed gear so that you can drive it backwards.

example.ex: He lurched the car in reverse along the ruts to the access road.
example.tran: 他顺着车辙摇摇晃晃地将车倒到了支路上。

entry.def: Reverse means opposite to what you expect or to what has just been described.

example.ex: The wrong attitude will have exactly the reverse effect.
example.tran: 错误的态度会产生完全相反的效果。

entry.def: If you say that one thing is the reverse of another, you are emphasizing that the first thing is the complete opposite of the second thing.

example.ex: There is absolutely no evidence at all that spectators want longer cricket matches. Quite the reverse...
example.tran: 完全没有证据表明观众想看时间更长的板球比赛。情况恰恰相反。

example.ex: This would lead one to expect a fat, dense and detailed autobiography. The reverse is true. The book is short and spare.
example.tran: 这会让人以为是一本内容晦涩而详尽的大部头自传。但正好相反，这本书简短明了。

entry.def: A reverse is a serious failure or defeat.

example.ex: It's clear that the party of the former Prime Minister has suffered a major reverse.
example.tran: 显然，前首相所在党派遭受了重大的挫折。

entry.def: The reverse or the reverse side of a flat object which has two sides is the less important or the other side.

example.ex: Cheques should be made payable to Country Living and your address written on the reverse.
example.tran: 支票抬头必须写“《乡村生活》杂志”，你的地址应写在背面。

entry.def: If something happens in reverse or goes into reverse, things happen in the opposite way to what usually happens or to what has been happening.

example.ex: Amis tells the story in reverse, from the moment the man dies...
example.tran: 埃米斯以倒叙的方式讲述了这个故事，从这个男人死去的时候开始讲起。

example.ex: The downward trend went into reverse and the scores started to creep up again.
example.tran: 比分下降的趋势发生逆转，分数又开始逐渐上升了。

entry.def: If you reverse the charges when you make a telephone call, the person who you are phoning pays the cost of the call and not you.

sentences.sentence: "the reversed collar looked as good as new"
